column4: any chance a new version of pam that was released might break cron?
Yes. But its been pulled from the repositories, it shouldn't download.
yeah a bunch of my servers updated at 6am today and they all pulled down new versions of that bad package
I manually updated around that time and grabbed it too.  The bug has a workaround for restarting cron, but we'll need to wait for the package to be updated before there is a real fix.
